function.name: defrost_turnOn
function.description: This function is used to turn on the defrost mode of a refrigerator.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the defrost mode.

weight.description: The weight value associated with the defrost mode.

weightUnit.description: The unit of the weight value associated with the defrost mode.
